TopicTitle: Twitch Thursdays: FerretBomb Lands His First Plane

Articles.Content:

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=FSP%2B-%2BFirst%2BLegit%2BAerospace%2BLanding&channel=ferretbomb&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=4304338"></object><br/>It’s always nice to see a KSP first as it happens.
